name: Pizza Delivery Demastered
description:
What started as a school project built entirely on a knockoff of an already terrible engine, Pizza Delivery Demastered is the reimagining of that very game. Play as Stanley (Definetly not the guardian from Petscop) and explore the unique 7 levels this game has to offer. Collect pizza, shoot pizza, kill foes. Deliver that pizza!

Note for mobile users:
You can pause the game and activate "Auto-sprint" so you can run without holding the O button!

Credits:

Coffee Bat - Most coding and music and spritework

Sinclair - spritework

Jefftastic - maker of the original Pizza Delivery!

Wanna play the original game? Here!
https://snap.berkeley.edu/project?user=jeffreymarx&project=Pizza%20Delivery!
